document_data.mainbody:
Sklorns Rest was a harbor on the isle of Sklorn in Sea of Swords, just off the shores of Candlekeep.
Sklorns Rest was a colloquial name given to Sklorns main harbor. It was located on the islands southern shores, with two good anchorages on both sides of Sklorns Rest. The harbor was surrounded by freshwater streams that tricked down the rocky elevation at the islands center.
